TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ReplicaRole extends System.Enum

summary.para: Indicates the role of a stateful service replica.

remarks.para: Service Fabric requires different behaviors from a service replica depending on what role it currently performs.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Fabric.ReplicaRole ActiveSecondary = int32(4)

summary.para: Refers to a replica in the set that receives state updates from the Primary replica, applies them, and sends acknowledgements back. Secondary replicas must participate in the write quorum for a replica set. There can be multiple active Secondary replicas in a replica set at a time. The number of active Secondary replicas is configurable that the reliability subsystem should maintain.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Fabric.ReplicaRole IdleSecondary = int32(3)

summary.para: Refers to a replica in the set that receives a state transfer from the Primary replica to prepare for becoming an active Secondary replica. There can be multiple Idle Secondary replicas in a replica set at a time. Idle Secondary replicas do not count as a part of a write quorum.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Fabric.ReplicaRole None = int32(1)

summary.para: Specifies that the replica has no responsibility in regard to the replica set.

remarks.para: When indicates this role, it is safe to delete any persistent state that is associated with this replica.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Fabric.ReplicaRole Primary = int32(2)

summary.para: Refers to the replica in the set on which all read and write operations are complete in order to enforce strong consistency semantics. Read operations are handled directly by the Primary replica, while write operations must be acknowledged by a quorum of the replicas in the replica set. There can only be one Primary replica in a replica set at a time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Fabric.ReplicaRole Unknown = int32(0)

summary.para: Indicates the initial role that a replica is created in.
